actions.text: On agreeing to the Kanjorski amendments (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 266 (Roll no. 68).

description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws which pertain to Medicare.
purpose: An amendment (comprised of amendment numbered 78 as printed in the Congressional Record and an additional amendment submitted from the floor but not printed and considered en bloc) to provide that the bill would not apply to laws and regulations regarding medicare.
